mapper.select: SELECT BO.no, --테이블 이름 == getter로 가져옴 BO.title, BO.content, US.name, BO.hit, TO_CHAR(BO.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, US.no userNo FROM board BO, users US WHERE BO.user_no = US.no order by reg_date desc
select u.name, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, b.title, b.content, b.no, b.user_no userNo from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}

SELECT BO.no, --테이블 이름 == getter로 가져옴 BO.title, BO.content, US.name, BO.hit, TO_CHAR(BO.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, US.no userNo FROM board BO, users US WHERE BO.user_no = US.no and bo.title LIKE '%'||#{word}||'%' order by reg_date desc
